name: commercetools
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing commercetools cloud resources.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`commercetools` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/unplatform-io/terraform-provider-commercetools).

nodejs.packageDescription: A Pulumi package for creating and managing commercetools cloud resources.
nodejs.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/unplatform-io/terraform-provider-commercetools)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-commercetools` repo](https://github.com/unplatform-io/pulumi-commercetools/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-commercetools` repo](https://github.com/unplatform-io/terraform-provider-commercetools/issues).

python.readme:
> This provider is a derived work of the [Terraform Provider](https://github.com/unplatform-io/terraform-provider-commercetools)
> distributed under [MPL 2.0](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/MPL/2.0/). If you encounter a bug or missing feature,
> first check the [`pulumi-commercetools` repo](https://github.com/unplatform-io/pulumi-commercetools/issues); however, if that doesn't turn up anything,
> please consult the source [`terraform-provider-commercetools` repo](https://github.com/unplatform-io/terraform-provider-commercetools/issues).

apiUrl.description: The API URL of the commercetools platform. https://docs.commercetools.com/http-api

clientId.description: The OAuth Client ID for a commercetools platform project. https://docs.commercetools.com/http-api-authorization

clientSecret.description: The OAuth Client Secret for a commercetools platform project. https://docs.commercetools.com/http-api-authorization

projectKey.description: The project key of commercetools platform project. https://docs.commercetools.com/getting-started

scopes.description:
A list as string of OAuth scopes assigned to a project key, to access resources in a commercetools platform project.
https://docs.commercetools.com/http-api-authorization

tokenUrl.description: The authentication URL of the commercetools platform. https://docs.commercetools.com/http-api-authorization

provider.description:
The provider type for the commercetools package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

isActive.description: Only active discount can be applied to the cart

key.description: User-specific unique identifier for a cart discount. Must be unique across a project

requiresDiscountCode.description:
States whether the discount can only be used in a connection with a
[DiscountCode](https://docs.commercetools.com/api/projects/discountCodes#discountcode)

sortOrder.description:
The string must contain a number between 0 and 1. All matching cart discounts are applied to a cart in the order defined
by this field. A discount with greater sort order is prioritized higher than a discount with lower sort order. The sort
order is unambiguous among all cart discounts

stackingMode.description: Specifies whether the application of this discount causes the following discounts to be ignored

target.description:
Empty when the value has type giftLineItem, otherwise a
[CartDiscountTarget](https://docs.commercetools.com/api/projects/cartDiscounts#cartdiscounttarget)

value.description:
Defines the effect the discount will have.
[CartDiscountValue](https://docs.commercetools.com/api/projects/cartDiscounts#cartdiscountvalue)

code.description:
Unique identifier of this discount code. This value is added to the cart to enable the related cart discounts in the
cart

groups.description: The groups to which this discount code belong

maxApplications.description: The discount code can only be applied maxApplications times

maxApplicationsPerCustomer.description: The discount code can only be applied maxApplicationsPerCustomer times per customer

validFrom.description: The time from which the discount can be applied on a cart. Before that time the code is invalid

validUntil.description: The time until the discount can be applied on a cart. After that time the code is invalid

isActive.description: When set the product discount is applied to products matching the predicate

key.description: User-defined unique identifier for the ProductDiscount. Must be unique across a project

sortOrder.description:
The string must contain a number between 0 and 1. All matching product discounts are applied to a product in the order
defined by this field. A discount with greater sort order is prioritized higher than a discount with lower sort order.
The sort order is unambiguous among all product discounts

Defines the effect the discount will have.

countries.description: A two-digit country code as per [ISO 3166-1 alpha-2](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2)

currencies.description: A three-digit currency code as per [ISO 4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217)

enableSearchIndexOrders.description: Enable the Search Indexing of orders

enableSearchIndexProducts.description: Enable the Search Indexing of products

key.description: The unique key of the project

shippingRateCartClassificationValues.description:
If shipping_rate_input_type is set to CartClassification these values are used to create tiers . Only a key defined
inside the values array can be used to create a tier, or to set a value for the shippingRateInput on the cart. The keys
are checked for uniqueness and the request is rejected if keys are not unique

shippingRateInputType.description:
Three ways to dynamically select a ShippingRatePriceTier exist. The CartValue type uses the sum of all line item prices,
whereas CartClassification and CartScore use the shippingRateInput field on the cart to select a tier

currencies.description: A three-digit currency code as per [ISO 4217](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_4217)

freeAbove.description: The shipping is free if the sum of the (custom) line item prices reaches the freeAbove value

shippingRatePriceTiers.description:
A price tier is selected instead of the default price when a certain threshold or specific cart value is reached. If no
tiered price is suitable for the cart, the base price of the shipping rate is used . See also [Shipping Rate Price Tier
API Docs](https://docs.commercetools.com/api/projects/shippingMethods#shippingratepricetier)

freeAbove.description: The shipping is free if the sum of the (custom) line item prices reaches the freeAbove value

key.description: Timestamp of the last Terraform update of the order.

name.description: Name of the State as localized string.

from.description: ID of the state to transition from

tos.description:
Transitions are a way to describe possible transformations of the current state to other states of the same type (for
example: Initial -> Shipped). When performing a transitionState update action and transitions is set, the currently
referenced state must have a transition to the new state. If transitions is an empty list, it means the current state is
a final state and no further transitions are allowed. If transitions is not set, the validation is turned off. When
performing a transitionState update action, any other state of the same type can be transitioned to

a final state and no further transitions are allowed. If transitions is not set, the validation is turned off. When
performing a transitionState update action, any other state of the same type can be transitioned to
